Negative Reviews: The room of the historical building is a bit dark.
Positive Reviews:
I stay in the historical room for two nights, and another tall building for another one night. The staffs are really helpful and responsive. I was not expected to get a high quality room with super city view.
Late check-in is available. 
Some of the rooms provides washing machine which is really helpful during the trip.
There's a path for guests to get directly to the subway without which is convenient.

Negative Reviews:
Internet is really slow. You can barely stream videos from your room. I'd suggest using the lobby wifi but keep in mind that the lobby wifi is also slow. 
If you plan on holding online meetings, don't use this hotel/residence.
Positive Reviews:
Location was great. Staff was friendly. Great gym. 
The room was relatively clean. I would stay here again.

Review Title: Great stay, very central location. Would recommend!
Negative Reviews: long waits for the elevator (sometimes waiting 5+ minutes), no blinds on skylight so room got quite bright early in the mornings
Positive Reviews: Very central location, nice, clean and spacious room, and friendly staff

Negative Reviews: Because hotel is downtown, you can hear noise from outside the building in my room its not loud very minimal.
Positive Reviews: Fabulous location, large clean comfortable rooms great views from the room, beds were super cofy nice pillows, staff friendly and helpful. Lounge was ideal to meet business contacts and bar staff provided great service nice ambiance in the area.  Will stay here again.

Review Title: enjoyed our one night stay, in room dining was really good
Negative Reviews: some marks on the towels and bed sheets
Positive Reviews:
Spacious room, good quiet location
very friendly staff

Review Title: Great downtown hotel with great amenities
Negative Reviews: The wifi was quite bad, probably because it was shared between all guests rather than by room.
Positive Reviews:
Great location downtown with a subway stop right outside. Walking distance from the main shopping area as well. The room was big and more than enough space for two plus large luggage.
The staff were great, and very helpful.
The fitness centre was well equipped.
The mini kitchen also came in very handy.

Negative Reviews:
Ok. This is the second North American 'suite' hotel I have stayed in the past 6 months (the other in NYC) and the same, albeit small, negatives apply.  I am presuming the designer in both instances was a male, and one who either didnt ask or didnt listen to any females when planning the rooms.

Theres a washer/dryer - amazing, way in excess of expectations.  And as I mentioned, the room is huge, massive, way bigger than I imagined.  However, the closet is tiny, like really really tiny, and has very little room for the length of dresses. It also has no light - I had to use my phone light to check the small amount of clothes I was able to hang up. (There was plenty of drawer space - but lots of clothes need hanging up).  The lighting in general throughout the room is poorly thought out, its incohesive and insufficient. 

 For a suite which is very suitable for longer stays, this isnt good enough. The daft thing is that there is tons of unecessary space in the bathroom behind the closet that could have been used, with very little imagination required. 

Then you have good kitchen appliances, again the dishwasher is way more than expected - but there is poor plates/cutlery/pans.  The plates etc are plastic, and there was a huge stock pot and frying pan, instead of smaller more usable items - who wants to make a massive stew!  

None of these negatives have a huge impact, partly because everything else is really fantastic.  Remodelling the closet isnt an easy fix, but the kitchen items are.
Positive Reviews:
Great location.  The Path and King metro line is at the bottom of the stairs in the lobby. Ten mins walk to Union Station.  Perfect.  Quick and friendly check in, which was very welcome after a long journey from the UK.

The Tower superior suite is huge, two tv's (!), a lounge area, good size bathroom, kitchen area with washer dryer, dishwasher, fridge, microwave and small hob. The bed is comfortable, and my room had city views in three directions.

The gym/sauna is small but perfectly formed, lots of variety of equipment and it was quiet each time I went in there.

Everywhere was clean and quiet, fabulous. I would stay here again and recommend it to people I liked.

Negative Reviews: Some noises in the hallway by the same people, large loose furniture, and doors slamming.
Positive Reviews:
The check-in/check-out process was simple, the staff representative was knowledgeable, and provided great service.

The facility was clean, social distance and masks were worn, insuite amenities are great.

Location is central, and reflects Toronto.

Review Title: great location, awesome lounge area to start your night.
Negative Reviews:
rooms are a little bit dated, especially the kitchenettes and bathroom.
towels are rough. heating fan is loud
Positive Reviews:
great location, beautiful historic building. 
really friendly staff. no wait for check in. live music and buck oysters on Thursday night. beds were very comfy

Review Title: Great location but not a great nights sleep.
Negative Reviews: Our main issue was that we both found the bed and pillows uncomfortably soft and the AC/Heat unit way too loud. As a result both of us had a very poor night sleep. Additionally, our room was sold to us a large two room suite (According to the pictures/dimensions on Booking.com)but was actually a an average sized room with a kitchenette along one wall.
Positive Reviews: The location is excellent and the building is beautiful. We found the building and our room to be very clean and the staff personable and helpful. Our room had a lovely floor to ceiling window with a great view of Downtown.

Negative Reviews: The room would have been much more spacious without the kitchen (which was of no interest to us). More significantly, however, was the absence of amenities we have become accustomed to when staying at reasonably nice hotels: there were no water bottles in the fridge, no extra blankets, no housecoats (apparently, we could have asked for all of these - but that is reactive, not proactive!). Worse was the fact that housekeeping hadn't bothered to advise that the clock was an hour off, or that the safe wasn't working (it needed fresh batteries - once they were installed, the safe lit up to show it was active again).
Positive Reviews: Excellent location. Very attractive lobby. FRONT DESK staff were great - but, as later noted, housekeeping staff really didn't do their job. Bed was comfortable.

Review Title: Spacious room and kind staff in a great location.
Negative Reviews: Room was a little dated and the day I checked in I felt housekeeping was a little lacking - kitchenette could have been cleaner, scant supplies in the bathroom. The clean after Day 2 was much more thorough and lovely including more towels than I had when I checked in, etc.
Positive Reviews:
Really friendly staff, great location, spacious room, had a good night's sleep, comfy bed.
It was so hot in Toronto when I was there and the air conditioning did an amazing job, thankfully!
Cost of hotel rooms have gone up so much - I would have rated this property higher at a lower room rate, this just felt a bit basic for the price point.

Negative Reviews: Somewhat dated, especially bathroom and kitchenette. Furniture doors and drawers closed poorly.
Positive Reviews: Spacious room, great location in downtown, great view overlooking the city and the lake. Comfortable bed. Big tv's in both rooms. Washer and dryer in the suite. Friendly staff.

Negative Reviews: The sheets on the bed had a hole in the middle and the plumbing was a little noisy. Could use some updating in the kitchenette area.
Positive Reviews:
The location was perfect and the staff friendly. The room was nice and large with a deep bathtub. Lobby smelled wonderful.
I will return in the future!

Review Title: A bit disappointing based on previous stays, but well-priced and comfortable.
Negative Reviews: What was disappointing may have been largely due to difficulties caused by COVID. Room had no water other than Toronto tap (not nice). It was advertised as having a kitchenette; this was true, but dishes were few and cutlery, dishes and pots and pans non-existent. Fitness centre was closed. There was a fridge and a corkscrew, thank goodness! Was surprised that a $200 security/damage deposit was insisted upon at check-in; five days later it still hasn't been reversed on our credit card.
Positive Reviews: Comfortable room with a fine view of City and Lake. Nearby handicapped street parking thanks to Toronto's generous policies toward handicapped persons. Staff made every effort to be friendly and helpful.

Negative Reviews: Kitchenette could have been supplied with washing up liquid and dishwasher tabs (although the cleaner did eventually give us some washing up liquid); the kitchenette needed a bit of updating as a bit tired looking; a bit more cutlery and plates would have been good too.
Positive Reviews: Great location; friendly, helpful staff; good size studio; comfy bed; good on-site cafe; gym, sauna, and jacuzzi were a bonus

Negative Reviews: Kitchenette could have been supplied with washing up liquid and dishwasher tabs (although the cleaner did eventually give us some washing up liquid); the kitchenette needed a bit of updating as a bit tired looking; a bit more cutlery and plates would have been good too.
Positive Reviews: Great location; friendly, helpful staff; good size studio; comfy bed; good on-site cafe; gym, sauna, and jacuzzi were a bonus

Review Title: Amazing stay at a brilliantly situated and comfortable hotel
Negative Reviews: I could hear the sounds from the suite next door to ours, they had their kitchenette near the front of their room hence i suspect why.  Fortunately the occupant was not very loud, but this could have been very annoying.
Positive Reviews: Superbly clean facility. Beautiful view. Brilliant location in middle of downtown, right next to King station. Remarkably comfortable and large bed for 2. Powerful warm showers (very hot in the mornings). Excellent coffee shop (daily ritual) attached next door...perfect Lattes. Gym, spa and sauna were a wonderful addition and high-end. Staff were helpful, AND they make an sour apple martini at the bar!!!! We would Definitely return.

Negative Reviews: The Air C was poor, the room was hot all night, parking little expensive.
Positive Reviews: Excellent location, staff friendly, excellent and luxury installations, fast elevators, suite clean with city view, comfortable bed.

Review Title: Excellent location, clean, friendly staff. Daily housekeeping is unreliable.
Negative Reviews:
Daily housekeeping did not come every day of our stay there, even though we left the rooms at the same time every day for the same amount of time (most of the afternoons). 
Sometimes the lifts can be a bit of a wait and can be crowded full of guests. 
Side door entrance was closed after certain hours
Could not really tell the differences between the tower vs heritage rooms before booking to make the decision. 
The bathroom is a bit small and outdated
Positive Reviews:
We came in the dead of winter so we really appreciated the direct link to the underground path
Even without the link to the path, it was still an excellent location, right at King station and streetcar access. 
The hotel bar had attentive service
Had a kitchenette and laundry in room!

Review Title: Pleasant and worth it on a discount but wouldn't stay again without
Negative Reviews:
- Room given to us was unfortunately not the one reserved. Expected to have more of a sitting area/lounge like the images, but was given more of a small square room with a desk and single chair.
- Not great cooking utensils (one pot and one pan that's it)
- A lot of amenities closed due to COVID (understandable and unavoidable)
Positive Reviews:
- Good location, links up to PATH underground walkway (walked straight from Union Station in the winter)
- Friendly and helpful staff
- Nice high ceilings on the rooms

Negative Reviews: The hotel is clean, small minor cleaning improvements could be done. To be honest, the place is very accommodating. If I asked for kitchen utensils etc, I would receive them in a timely manner so really not much to complain about.
Positive Reviews: The location is great for tourism, its a very busy location though. Room views are wonderful especially on the high floors. There are a lot of wonderful staff at this hotel too. Special mention of Chloe, really hospitable check in experience. Each room/suite has a kitchenette, which is a requirement for us. The larger rooms are often occupied so its worthwhile booking them as early as possible.

Negative Reviews: Cleanliness - We had to change rooms on the second night. The room was on the smaller size for two guests (not enough space for luggage) and had dust on desk and tv area. Our second room was perfectly clean and spacious enough.
Positive Reviews:
Perfect location
Friendly and helpful staff
Good room size
Comfortable 
Nice views

Negative Reviews: no parking on site for our vehicle. the parking garage they direct you costs $73/night. Sleep quality is poor due to poor blinds in the bedroom which fails to keep sunlight out.
Positive Reviews: Central location, Friendly staff, comfortable beds,

Negative Reviews: Very loud, getting an elevator in the morning is a nightmare. Our room had a modem or something on the ceiling that was so bright it illuminated the entire room at night. Hotel should consider a piece of black tape or something to cover the light. It made it difficult to sleep.
Positive Reviews: Nice rooms, view and location. Also valet service was great

Review Title: Great location and clean. Make sure you verify hidden costs and parking options before getting there
Negative Reviews:
They direct to a near by parking if theirs is full, I payed 63 dollars for a stay from 5pm-11am!!
No where on their ratings did it say a daily maximum rate and this even for down town Toronto is extremely expensive.
Their hair blow dryer is ancient and does not work, and yes I pressed in the red button, still nothing.
If you order warm water for the babyâ€™s formula they bring it in a pot and will charge u about 5 dollars !!! I know some hotels do that but they should let you know the cost entailed ahead of time especially when you tell them itâ€™s for a babyâ€™s forums bottle. There was no kittle in the room then they brought one. That should be in the room as you check in, itâ€™s not listed as an available amenity.
Positive Reviews: Location was excellent, room was clean. Guest services respond promptly and are friendly.

Negative Reviews: in a room with a kitchenette there were too few utensils, no wash-up liquid or dishwasher capsules
Positive Reviews: comfortable bed, great view, helpful staff

Review Title: Beautiful presidential suite with lovely views
Negative Reviews:
I was hoping for a bathtub but got a shower, which was nice though. 
The elevators seemed a bit slow.
Positive Reviews: Beautiful suite with kitchen area. Fantastic views of downtown Toronto and the lake from the 41st floor. The staff was very nice and the bed was out of this world comfortable. I was worried about noise knowing Toronto but there was (almost) none. I wish I had stayed longer.

Negative Reviews: the room was pretty different from the photos on booking.com. the photos made it look like a suite with a separate living room - this wasnâ€™t the case - just one big room with a little kitchenette. elevators were slow which is unavoidable in a busy hotel but just a heads up to leave yourself some extra time.
Positive Reviews: room was large & clean, staff were friendly. good location near pubs & places to eat.

Review Title: Great hotel located centrally in downtown Toronto.
Negative Reviews: No water bottles in the room. The kitchen was smaller than I thought it would be based on the room photos (there was supposed to be an eating area).
Positive Reviews: Great location! Connects directly to the Path and to a metro station. Walking distance to the Union station. Our room had a great view of the tower. Friendly and helpful staff.

Review Title: Decent stay but I hope thereâ€™s better out there for the price.
Negative Reviews: The room was disappointing. The finishes were worn â€” chipped paint, scuffed walls, stained counters, which made the room feel less clean.  The bed was thankfully perfectly clean, but the rest of the cleaning was not up to par â€” sink not washed out, dusty surfaces, streaks and watermarks on bathroom fixtures. It wasnâ€™t dirty â€” it just wasnâ€™t as clean as I would hope for the price. Noise was a problem. I was near the elevator and I could hear everything from the hall as people went by. I was woken multiple times by people talking in regular voices outside and in the middle of the night by crashing/banging from the room above. Other guests werenâ€™t being unreasonably noisy â€” it just wasnâ€™t well insulated. It was a busy time and there was often a significant wait for the elevators.
Positive Reviews: Location and view were incredible. Perfect home base for exploring Toronto. Service was friendly and punctual. The room had good amenities like the kitchenette, though the drawers, cutlery, etc were less than clean and there was no coffee in the room. Bed was comfortable and clean.

Negative Reviews:
Room was outdated and not very clean.
Historical suites are very noisy..loud and drunk neighbors. 
Lots of dirt under sofa and kitchen cabinets.
They actually leave an almost done toilet paper roll for the next guest...I found that disgusting.
Positive Reviews:
Friendly staff and attentive. Helped resolve an issue I had with the first room.
Excellent location 
Beds are very comfortable

Review Title: Comfortable. We would stay here again
Negative Reviews: We booked the room because it advertised kitchen facilities. But it had very little to cook with.  We had to ask for frying pan and toaster.  Nothing in the room to tidy up etc.  But great room if you donâ€™t need to use the kitchen facilities
Positive Reviews: Staff were friendly and helpful. Location was very central and easy to reach.  Room was comfortable and very clean. it was a pleasant stay overall.

Negative Reviews: Lighting a bit dim in  bedroom area. Room not as large as some we've stayed in in Northern America/Canada. Lobby area can be loud with music from bar. Lifts can take a long time to arrive during busy times.
Positive Reviews: Great location, within walking distance to everything. Staff friendly. Room clean and comfortable with nice views over city.

Negative Reviews: The room was officially a "suite" but only with pantry, no extra space for sitting or eating.
Positive Reviews: The room was amazing at 28th floor with a corner view to the CN tower. Very good location. Very friendly staff. The bed were very comfortable. Amazing was to see the vault of the former Dominion bank in the basement! The access to the hotel is also possible through Toronto's Underground Pedestrian Walkway.

Negative Reviews:
The room wasnâ€™t soundproofed. I could hear people talking and laughing in the corridor at night and early morning. 
I would have preferred a thicker duvet or perhaps  to have an extra one in the wardrobe, as it was cold at night. It would have been nice to have some kitchen towels and dish washing liquid in the kitchen area.
Positive Reviews:
The location in downtown was excellent, just eight minutes walk from Union Station. The suit was beautiful and comfortable. Everything was impeccably clean. I loved the bathroom with a separate shower and bathtub.
The gentleman who took care of my suitcases  when I checked out was very friendly and helpful. Check out was simple, I just dropped my keys in a box.

Review Title: Decent hotel in good location but misses the mark a bit.
Negative Reviews: bathroom was a bit on the small side. was also a bit disappointed by the kitchenette. it had a cooking range but no pots or pans to cook with (and nothing to say how to get it either).  It kind of defeated the purpose of having a kitchenette. Room could also have used a kettle.
Positive Reviews: location was good. room was a good size and the service staff (bellman, waiters, cleaning staff) were excellent.

Review Title: great location but need to think to logistics of check in process when there is unloading from a car
Negative Reviews: why is the bathroom right beside bed..? didnâ€™t have any hand soap in the room upon arrival. got $100 parking ticket because there was nowhere to unload bags. not sure how you expect people to check in when there is no where to unload to bring into the hotel without having to drag luggage bags around the city
Positive Reviews: great location and friendly check in staff. comfortable beds

Negative Reviews: The kitchenette with dishwasher and washing machine is nice in principal, but without a sponge, dish-soap, dishwaser soap or washing machine detergent its not very useful. Having some as an offer like shampoo/body soap or being able to buy some in small quantities would be nice. The dishes in the kitchenette were not clean and in general the whole room could have used a more thorough cleanliness check (there were fake eyelashes in the bathroom...)
Positive Reviews: Great location, friendly staff, nice view from the room, big room, big bed.

Negative Reviews: The photos of the rooms are confusing. It looked like the bedroom was separate from the kitchen, but we were told that it really only looks that way. Also, the room was much smaller than it was presented.
Positive Reviews: The hotel is really modern and the staff is nice. The view from the room was breathtaking.

Negative Reviews:
Room was a little dark and a little pricey.

The hotel's entrance to the PATH was not sign posted well enough.  

Building alarm went off in the middle of the night, but the in-room speaker kept us well informed.
Positive Reviews:
Corner window had good views of the CN tower and lake Ontario on the higher floors.  The room's kitchenette surprisingly had a dishwasher.  

The staff were very professional.  The hotel has its own entrance to the PATH making it very accessible.

Negative Reviews: It would be better if washing pods were provided. The elevators can be a little busy sometimes. The bed was super comfortable but did have chemical smells from the washing.
Positive Reviews: Perfect location, service, bed and a good view from my room.The room is big enough and certainly is  good value for money. There is even a washer/dryer in my room.

Review Title: Overall, a very enjoyable stay! Would definitely stay here again!
Negative Reviews: Interior of room a bit older as we stayed in the older building and not the tower. Had a washing machine in the unit, but it had a funky smell, so we didnâ€™t use it. All very minuscule issues. Would definitely stay here again!
Positive Reviews: Location - steps from Eaton Center downtown, and right across the street from a subway station. Very friendly staff! Had luggage storage, and was able to check in a little earlier at 1pm. Mini fridge kept things cold!

Negative Reviews: During the weekend it seems like there was a party inside one of the hotel rooms. Very loud music and talking noise, and it seems that nobody was going to do something against it. Very uncomfortable.
Positive Reviews: Location of the hotel was really good. Desk staff was friendly enough to help, but not really excited to do extra like good morning or good evening wishes, though the luggage carriers were really friendly. The hotel room was clean and comfortable.

Review Title: Good value, dated hotel, nice staff, bed could be comfier
Negative Reviews: Hotel is dated. In the room, there are no master switches or ones that turn on multiple lights - you need to walk to each light fixture and manually turn it on. Bedsheets were a little rough and less comfortable.
Positive Reviews: Excellent staff who upgraded our room during the 1-night stay unprompted. Good value for a downtown core location

Negative Reviews: Room had issues with a leak on 3 consecutive days. We was told it was OK after 2nd day but came back to a room smelling of damp as carpet was soaking wet in one area. Was offered to move to another room of same standard on 3rd day but as we was due to leave after another night felt it wasn't worth it. Room was not hoovered when we was there and there was levels of dust you wouldn't expect. Dirty Cups and glasses were taken from the Room but never replaced. We had to constantly ask for new ones as well as teabags,milk, bottled water.
Positive Reviews: Excellent location. Staff (think he was called David) on concierge desk was very helpful. In general the staff we met were very polite and welcoming. Nice comfortable bed.

Negative Reviews:
Layout was sloppy and room construction was slapdash (wires running everywhere)

Bathroom was below average
Positive Reviews:
The location
The staff 
Room size

Review Title: Overall, good but not that worthy.
Negative Reviews: the air conditioner is so noisy (heat mode), canâ€™t even sleep at nights
Positive Reviews: good location, which makes me have a good view; clean stuffs; services are great.

Negative Reviews: Room 725 had hardly any natural light coming in and was so dark. The place is so big with a mix of long term and short term guests that it felt quite impersonal.
Positive Reviews: Nice big rooms with kitchen unit etc. The first room (internal view) had hardly any daylight so for the 2nd night they switched me to a room with an outward facing window which was appreciated. Very clean and the staff were very pleasant and helpful.

Negative Reviews:
Furniture needed some restoration
Safe too low could only access by crawling on floor
Positive Reviews:
Location
Very comfortable beds
Some room problems but the staff sorted very quickly

Negative Reviews: The door would need a little upgrade. At night, light was clearly coming from all around it and it was pretty annoying. We were guaranteed an upgrade that we didn't obtain but I never took it up to the reception desk as I was ok with the room we were attributed anyway.
Positive Reviews: The location was perfect for shopping and getting around. Staff was very attentive and the automated SMS messages were of great pertinence. The bedding was great.

Negative Reviews: The bathroom was a bit old.
Positive Reviews: The room had a great view and was very large. Great location, very friendly staff.

Negative Reviews: we ordered a double room thinking that the two beds were king size, but we should have ordered a queen size room
Positive Reviews: great location, extremely clean and friendly staff

Negative Reviews: My only issue was with the air conditioner/heater. We were trying to set it to heat at a certain degree however it kept defaulting to cool air.
Positive Reviews: Staff were friendly, very clean, nice scenery, good location. What is advertised in photos is correct! Will be visiting again!

Review Title: Good for an overnight stay. Good value for the money in the heart of Downtown Toronto.
Negative Reviews: The room was a little dated and the sitting room furniture was soiled and had seen better days.
Positive Reviews: Very good location, very large room. Staff was very friendly.

Negative Reviews: The room decor was starting to look a little dated, but still clean and comfortable
Positive Reviews: Great service and location, clean rooms and characterful historic buiksin

Negative Reviews: double bed was a little small for two and the over sized pillows were uncomfortable
Positive Reviews: great location, helpful staff, very clean, stylish room

Negative Reviews: Only thing we noticed after check-in, that we (my partner and i) started itching and it looks like bed bugs. Which is weird, because we were supposed to have hypoallergenic bedding..
Positive Reviews: Great location, comfy beds and kind staff. Was nice that we could leave the luggage a few more hours after checkout.

Negative Reviews: Delay in allocating room and not coming back to us after several emails with regard to price discrepancy,
Positive Reviews:
The staff were great.
2nd room had a view of the lake which was lovely.

Negative Reviews: Weirdly we had terrible cell reception while in our room, but that was likely more an international coverage issue, not hotel related.  Nothing else was a negative during our stay.
Positive Reviews: The hotel lived up to the reviews we read before selecting it for our stay. Staff were friendly and helpful. We arrived an hour early and they were able to check us in and even honored our special request for a room on a high floor. Our room on the 39th had a beautiful water view, was very clean and modern. It was centrally located to all the areas we wanted to visit. Entrance to The Path via the hotel and right across the street as well. We would absolutely stay again!

Negative Reviews: Historic room looking a bit dated, worn wallpaper, tiles in bathroom a bit stained.
Positive Reviews: Staff are friendly and helpful, always a smile. Location is perfect, walk to everything and transit right outside the door. Amenities in the room greatly appreciated for convenience, always nice to have good coffee and a refrigerator.

Negative Reviews: Could have done with a curtain between the bed area and the rest of the suit. And  Blackout blinds in the bedroom
Positive Reviews: Cleanliness, location, but most of all the staff. Nothing was a problem for them.

Negative Reviews: very ruined blinders in one of the rooms. For a quality hotel like this one ,it made it look bad. What a pity.
Positive Reviews: Wonderful hotel downtown. Big rooms with amazing view of the city/lake. Clean, quiet, with all the necessary for a wonderful vacation. Kind staff that are 200% client oriented.

Negative Reviews:
We didn't get a notice about the fire alarm being tested in the morning, which we understand and are totally fine with, just wished they mentioned it as we were still asleep and I do have a heart condition and not too good being woken up by an alarm haha.
Also 35$ for 3 ice reams and 1 tea was crazy so if you want a snack recommend elsewhere
Positive Reviews: Rooms beautiful and location is great, staff is always super friendly and welcoming and the atmosphere is gorgeous.

Review Title: overall a great stay , I stayed before, and Iâ€™d stay again
Negative Reviews: the bed wasnâ€™t very comfortable for a tall man , Iâ€™m 6â€™4 feet were sticking out of the bed
Positive Reviews: location is excellent, very clean , staff very friendly and helpful

Negative Reviews: Room was too warm until we opened the door into the main living area where the air conditioner was. The coffee spot (Ritual Cafe) had limited seating and only basic offerings.
Positive Reviews: Lovely size room with comfortable pullout couch and all the appliances. The staff were exceptionally helpful, even before we arrived. They allowed us to email the documents so that our daughter could check in before us when our flight was delayed repeatedly. Beautiful view from the 26th floor.

Negative Reviews: The room we stayed at wasn't very clean, we found dust around the windows and desk, found a piece of garment from previous guests by a window behind the curtain.
Positive Reviews: Location was excellent! Easy access to TTC and UP express and ferry to the islands. Amazing views from the top floors and very comfy bed. Staff were helpful and friendly.

Negative Reviews: interior room was like a dungeon, online description not accurate to represent the sincere last of sunlight
Positive Reviews: location, elegance, clean, friendly service

Negative Reviews: Short beds, super dry air.
Positive Reviews: Location, staff, room amenities.

Review Title: Comfy stay with great views over the city
Negative Reviews: The room could use a little bit of love - some of the cabinets could use some new paint and the bathroom wasn't very well lit and could do with an upgrade. We could also hear everyone coming in and out of their rooms throughout all hours of the night. It was a Saturday so we understand it was busy. However, the rooms really aren't soundproof so we didn't get too good of a sleep despite the bed being comfy.
Positive Reviews: We stayed in a suite which was perfect for us as we had to get up very early and appreciated having coffee/tea and a fridge in the room. We had a really nice view over the city/lake and our check in was really smooth. The bathroom came well stocked and the body lotion smelled absolutely amazing. We couldn't figure out how to turn on the TV when we came in and texted their number and someone came up really quickly to help. All staff were super friendly!

Review Title: Fantastic. The staff and property are simply fantastic.

Positive Reviews: This was one of the best hotel stays Iâ€™ve ever had. The staff was phenomenal, the property location cannot be beat, and most importantly the bed was so comfortable.  I will stay here again without question as hotels like this are rare these days!

Negative Reviews: Nothing really, there was a bit of dust in some hard to reach places which I noticed but it didn't bother me. Would have like a kettle but that's a european thing i think
Positive Reviews: The room was really nice and comfortable. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The location was great for sightseeing and close to the train station as well, so easy journey to and from Pearson Airport. Would recommend this hotel.

Review Title: Fantastic views of downtown and Lake Ontario
Negative Reviews: Shower is not the large one. Itâ€™s small but thr pressure is good. A little noisy on the corridor from 8a.m. Not good for late sleepers. The curtains are ok to block the morning lights but not totally.
Positive Reviews: View from the room.  All members of staff fantastic.

Negative Reviews: It didn't make much difference to us, but in a two bedroom suite the only bathroom was an ensuite off one of the bedrooms.  If you were the guest in the other bedroom you would have to go into the main bedroom to use it, no matter what hour of the day or night.
Positive Reviews: The bed was very comfortable. The suite had everything you could possibly need. The staff was always very pleasant and helpful. The views from our room were outstanding.

Review Title: Would stay here again if I came back

Positive Reviews:

Courteous staff

Comfy beds

Negative Reviews: Some renovation in the rooms especially in bathroom required
Positive Reviews: Room size and location, lovely staff

Negative Reviews: Bathroom looked outdated
Positive Reviews:

Review Title: wonderful stay. great staff. will be back.
Negative Reviews: loud air conditioning
Positive Reviews: location. cleanliness. modern amenities. dog friendly.

Negative Reviews: Pricey and also room was smaller than booked  was supposed to have separate bedroom. Annoying to have to ask for things you usually just have in room. Like robes. Oven was dirty and set off fire alarm when using it,but they provided toaster when asked.
Positive Reviews: Great location. Room was comfy.  Great service through text. Also luxury having washing machine!

Negative Reviews: Loud air conditioner just under the windows of our room ( our room - 19th and 21st floor ) on the roof of the old part of the hotel!
Positive Reviews: room, location, staff

Negative Reviews: The bedside light is too glaring to be restful, but this is the only temporary flaw. My suite had no alarm clock/radio this time.

Negative Reviews: Except beds were a bit small/short, even if I Ã¡m not that tall, just 1, 74 m.
Positive Reviews: Nice and comfortable room. Perfect location. Nice and helpfull staff. Almost everything. ðŸ˜Š

The staff were very helpful and efficient when we needed trolleys, extra wine glasses, etc. The views were phenomenal and the room was modern and comfortable. Would recommend and would stay here again. Thank you, we enjoyed it very much.

Review Title: Great value, comfortable room, canâ€™t wait to go back!

Negative Reviews: The only thing that could be better is the door on the bathroom. It was a simple sliding door and lock and I felt I needed more privacy, especially as the bathroom is right next to the bed. That's all!
Positive Reviews: The room was spotless and massive, with everything you could wish for including a small sitting area and materials to cook if you wish. It had a stunning view of the city during a blizzard, but at night, I felt on top of the world. The staff were so beyond helpful and when I showed up at 7am needing a place to store my bags, they checked me into a room right away! The concierge service was lovely as well and we felt so treated on our anniversary.

Negative Reviews: The fridge in the room was extremely noisy
Positive Reviews: The location is great and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are big and the tower suites have some nice views over Toronto

Negative Reviews: The furniture was a little worn.
Positive Reviews: Great location and well staffed. Bed was really comfortable and the view was wonderful. The front desk staff were outstanding

Review Title: Very happy with great staff and so convenient to what we were doing.

Positive Reviews: Staff friendly and very helpful . Location was convenient  staff kindly let us into our room early which l thought was fantastic and wasnâ€™t expected

Review Title: Superb location and fabulous views from the upper floors.
Negative Reviews: Rooms slightly smaller than expected.

Review Title: A comfortable stay which exceeded our expectations.

Positive Reviews: Location locationâ€¦..Apartment style comfortable rooms, and warm welcoming staff. Happy hour times were convenient as well.

Review Title: Weekend away in Toronto at a premium hotel.
Negative Reviews: Bathroom light switch was on the outside of the bathroom. Lol. Other than that it was great.

Positive Reviews: Great location and excellent customer service care. Beautiful inside and suite was good size.

Negative Reviews: Would have liked a full length mirror in the room.
Positive Reviews: Great location & great room. Beds were comfortable and staff were friendly.

Review Title: Wonderful stay, excellent location, great staff
Negative Reviews: Bathrooms could be updated
Positive Reviews: Fantastic location, great staff, nice rooms.

Review Title: A great location for a short city break.
Negative Reviews: No real dislikes but having a bathroom door that only slides can be quite noisy when one of you gets up in the night to use the bathroom. A door takes up more room but is so much more practical.
Positive Reviews: Front desk staff were very friendly and thoughtful. Considering we had a room on the 32nd floor the lifts were fast and frequent. Location is very central - a short walk from Union Station. The fitness centre was very well equipped.

Negative Reviews: Air conditioning
Positive Reviews: The location is perfect, making it easy to explore the surrounding area. The housekeeping service was excellent; the room was always clean and well-maintained. The bedding was exceptionally comfortable, ensuring a good night's sleep

Negative Reviews: The fridge in the room was extremely noisy
Positive Reviews: The location is great and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are big and the tower suites have some nice views over Toronto

Negative Reviews: The room did feel bit old and felt like maintenance is needed. Also, I think cleanliness could be improved. It would be nice to have shower gowns and slippers as it is a 4 star hotel.
Positive Reviews: Location was great, had a metro station next to the hotel and the Union station was within walking distance. Loved Byredo amenities! Bed was comfy and room size was spacious. Hotel staffs were lovely too.

Negative Reviews: the bathroom is very small, but the thing I really didnâ€™t like was the shower. it is supposed to be a raining shower but it is small and the water jet was too strong and uncomfortable also cannot regulate the temperature (only hot or cold). would be better to have a proper raining shower plus the one you can manually use
Positive Reviews: perfect location, welcoming lobby and staff. spacious and clean room, amazing view

Negative Reviews: Like all things in Canada, quite expensive for what you get, so we were a bit underwhelmed, as this was a special trip for our daughters wedding. We arrived to find a half drunken bottle of water in our fridge, suggesting it hadn't been cleaned. We also had to kill cockroaches in our room on 2 occasions and we were on the 28th floor! So kind of disappointing, although we realise that things like this are difficult to control during the summer months
Positive Reviews: Good bar area, the rooms were nice (but not exceptional), great location, helpful staff

Review Title: Great value for the location and cool historic building. Exceptional customer service.
Negative Reviews: Rooms could be more modern but are still good.
Positive Reviews: Great location, nice rooms - spacious and really good views of the city. Make sure to stay in the Tower suites.  The building was really historic and cool, and the staff were really lovely and helpful.

Review Title: Great stay for family except deposit policy.
Negative Reviews: Need to pay $500 deposit (2 rooms, $250 for each). So far, 5 days, havenâ€™t got it back. I stayed 6 hotels in my whole trip. This hotel is the only one which requests this. Annoying that I have to follow up with it. Hoping it will be a smooth process.
Positive Reviews:
Just stayed one night. Stayed in the historic building. Great location. Fancy and clean. Washing/dryer machine is convenient. Kitchen is useful too. 

Services meet the standard of this type of hotel.

Negative Reviews: On this occasion stay was for medical appointments and there was nothing not to like. Privacy and quiet were respected, as was room choice and Reservations and Front Desk team always do their best to accommodate.
Positive Reviews: Excellent, considerate and efficient staff who contribute greatly to a successful stay. Rooms are comfortable and with well-equipped kitchen space for simple meal prep. Very comfortable beds and great central location with transportation and shopping just steps away. Interesting historical building with various Toronto history highlights described on placards on different floors.

Review Title: Fabulous downtown hotel for good price.
Negative Reviews: Wi-fi was a bit slow for video calls, but otherwise fine. Otherwise very comfortable hotel room.
Positive Reviews: Arrived earlier than expected. Was able to check in at 1 pm. Reception staff very friendly, concierge had already offered to hold my bags in case my room was not ready however no need. Room was very clean, high floor with great views. Facilities were exceptional. Bathroom was divine - large waterfall shower, didn't use the bath but looked equally lovely.

Negative Reviews: Room could have been a little cleaner/better kept but it was good overall. Aircon was extremely loud and flashing light on the smoke alarm woke us a few times. No ceiling light in the bedroom which was a little annoying.
Positive Reviews: Location was excellent, views were great and the bar was lovely. Shower was really good as was the TV and streaming services. Staff were nice and helpful.

Negative Reviews: Some of the furniture was starting to look scuffed and worn.
Positive Reviews: Comfy bed, large room with good facilities. Location is excellent. Staff were professional and courteous.

Review Title: Great rooms and location. No complaints
Negative Reviews: The rooms aren't very sound proof so consider that if you plan on hosting people.
Positive Reviews: Perfect location for sports and bars. Spacious rooms with full kitchen and clothes washer. Bathrooms are modern. Lots of staff and very friendly.

Negative Reviews: Poor wi-fi, no pool, no rooftop bar, small bathroom with poorly designed sliding doors, not enough hangers in bathroom
Positive Reviews: Location, room view, high floor spacious room with nice decor and proper kitchen, awesome history of the building with great architecture and vault in basement, fast elevators, super kind staff, great cosmetics and coffee, great cleanliness with daily visits, amazing lobby with tellerâ€™s bar, underground PATH connection

Negative Reviews: There are a few different variations of the same room category, so the photos online may not be exactly what you get. I booked a Tower ONE suite which appeared to have a separate bedroom, but the room was open plan. No complaints, however, as we still liked the room.
Positive Reviews: The room was spacious and impeccably clean. Central location. Friendly and helpful staff who responded to requests diligently.

Negative Reviews: Bathroom is pretty small.  A washing machine would have been useful.
Positive Reviews: Great location in downtown area with subway, shops, cafes nearby.  Beautiful view from our room, which was spacious and clean, with a microwave and fridge. Good bed. Staff friendly and helpful.

Review Title: Great location, spacious rooms, wonderful staff.
Negative Reviews: The beds could be comfier.
Positive Reviews: This hotel was fantastic. From the moment we were greeted at reception to our checkout, it was a very positive experience. The rooms are very spacious, and the view is insane! We stayed here twice during a two-week period in two different parts of the hotel. The first was the historic tower, and although the rooms here are older, they are quite spacious and well-stocked. The best part of our stay was when my husband forgot his suit in the room's closet, the hotel reception was super helpful by getting it back to us in no time. Special shoutout to Matthew who helped with our bags, Muhammad at the valet, Ana Maria at reception, as well as the kindest night receptionist whose name I cannot remember, but she wore glasses and had copper curly hair.

Negative Reviews: I know the industry got severely hit by pandemic so it is only to improve later on. The amenities could be refreshed (cabinet doors, bathroom). I understand policy of no housekeeping when guests are in the room but I think it would be okay (as others in Toronto does it) to agree time of housekeeping and guests would leave the room for the time being for 5 nights it was starting to get uncomfortable without vacuuming and wiping table - no detergent/cloth provided. Kettle and coffee machine seen better days would be nice to upgrade those.
Positive Reviews: Staff 5stars! Location 5stars! Suite spacious and had veryyyy comfortable bed and pillows. Interior in general is classy but with kick on â€œhigh endâ€ we loved it! I will surely miss the smiley faces of all staff â¤ï¸ and morning runs for my Tim or Starbucks coffee. Staff - keep it up you all are amazing!

Review Title: Cheap â€œbed & breakfastâ€ in what could have been an iconic hotel if only the staff had any manners!
Negative Reviews: Horrible front desk experience. Colin at the front desk had a problem with me because Iâ€™m brown skinned and heâ€™s white. According to him, I donâ€™t deserve a clean room even if I paid to stay at the hotel.
Positive Reviews: Spacious rooms for the price, great location. Housekeeping staff did a great job!

Negative Reviews: The AC was a bit loud and went on and off to control room temperature.
Positive Reviews: the hotel was very centrally located and easy to find. Also staff was extremely polite, and the amenities in the rooms are the best! Gym has an amazing view and is equipped well.

Review Title: Great hotel at a reasonable price, right in downtown core
Negative Reviews: House cleaning too persistent, even with "do not disturb" sign. Construction in the morning (wasn't too bad though, rooms are decently soundproofed).
Positive Reviews: Excellent location, great decor, friendly staff, and spacious room.

Review Title: An amazing stay within walking distance of everything!
Negative Reviews: Not a huge issue but the curtains in the living room are stained on the bottom, and there was another stain on the carpet near the couch.

Bed was beyond comfortable and the room was nice and cold (outside it felt like 36 degrees). The staff were informative and I got a text once I got to my room. Tellers bar is a great bar and the staff there are excellent!!!  Would definitely come again!

Negative Reviews: The rooms are a little tired and a pool would have been the icing on the cake
Positive Reviews: Staff were excellent, the location is amazing, and the spa pool was a nice addition. Matthew, the concierge was fantastic and very helpful. We paid for a room upgrade.....WOW the view ðŸ˜

Negative Reviews: Could not get my two-bed room and I had to share a bed with my friend.
Positive Reviews:
Great location, nice staff!
Checking in was hard, since they had a new system in place. It Took us 40 min in the front desk. After checking in, the lady went to the elevator to tell us we got an Â«Â upgradeÂ Â». The bummer was to arrive in the room and see there was ONE bed and I had booked a two full-bed room. After calling them, I was told she gave us a larger room with a Â«Â sofa-bedÂ Â» because they were fully booked and could not provide my two beds! Shame.

Negative Reviews: The lower half of the sofa bed had a strange slope, probable due to wear and tear. It was fine for a teenager, but a full grown adult probably wouldn't have found it all that comfortable.
Positive Reviews: Wonderful and accommodating staff. Super, central location. Room facilities were great. The master bed was unbelievably comfortable. Slept like a baby!

Review Title: Great hotel in a fantastic location.
Negative Reviews: The only thing I would say is that the room could do with a new coat of paint and maybe a good carpet clean as it had a little bit of a dirty carpet smell, which smelt like old socks.
Positive Reviews: It was in a great location, had great views and the staff were very friendly. Our room was very nice and spacious.

Review Title: Good location, decent hotel but expect more.
Negative Reviews:
Beds were bit on small size.

At check in we weren't told that some floors are not accessible by the main elevators you see when you enter the elevator area. This led to confusion and having to find our way to the historic elevators with cases and a child doesn't lend itself to a relaxing start to stay.

At night the staff/security were over zealous in checking room card (even when it was scanned on door entry) and it wasn't done in the most friendly. I believe there may be issue with people using suites for parties but staff could be less abrupt and more friendly in request for key.
Positive Reviews:
Location was incredible and the room was a good size. 

Staff at bar and concierge were helpful and friendly.

Negative Reviews: No cleaning service at the money or gym but this is because of pandemic so not their fault
Positive Reviews:
Fabulous hotel
Staff super helpful
Location amazing
Rooms very spacious
Excellent value for money

Review Title: Comfortable bed, perfect location, and wonderful staff.
Negative Reviews: It was really loud in the hallway around our room in the morning. Normally you expect noise from guests going in and out, but our room must have been by some kind of service room for house keeping or something because it was loud every morning, which was disappointing. There was also a lot of dust on the tv console and the sheets had a tear and some other marks on them, so it made me question how clean the room really was.
Positive Reviews: Honestly, the bed was the highlight of our stay because it was SO COMFORTABLE. It was like sleeping in a cloud, it was literal perfection. I would return to this hotel just to sleep in that bed. Other than that, the hotel is in the perfect location, walking distance to everything and easy to get to by car. The staff was also great and we loved the bar!

Negative Reviews: Room was sub par, no extra blankets, gfi plug didnt work for coffee maker, bathtub was out of place it was old and didnt fit the decor. Lighting in kitchen area was odd. Needed a light under the kitchen cupboards to see what you are doing. Poor lighting in bedroom with very small cupboard and not enough hangars. Cupboard blocked the window. Noisy hallway at night. No mirror in bedroom for dressing. Very uncomfortable sofabed. Very expensive for 2 nights in a room that coukd gave been a holiday inn... normally this is my go to hotel. But i may rethink this for my next stay. Very disappointed.
Positive Reviews: Location excellent, close to subway, has valet parking, restaurant. Very good concierge, room service bar staff, food great.

Negative Reviews: The rooms could really do with some updating and bathroom needed refreshing. The cubicle is quite tight and lighting was not very good. The room decor just needs a little modernising to match the lobby/public areas
Positive Reviews: The location was great. You could actually access the subway/metro through the lower floor in the hotel (only found this out as we were leaving though). The bar served the best truffle fries Iâ€™ve ever had and great drinks too but was a little pricey. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Room was a great size for two people as we each had a double bed and lots of room to get ready etc. Overall, a great base for our amazing 2 nights in Toronto.

Negative Reviews: If you are always in a rush, ask for a low floor bedroom as at times the elevators can get extra busy
Positive Reviews: The hotel is like a little oasis in the middle of downtown. Once you step inside, all the noise and confusion of the city stays outside and itâ€™s all about comfort and joy. The lobby smells so good that itâ€™s impossible to go unnoticed and the bar at night is an irresistible invitation for a drink. The staff is friendly and I appreciated how they acknowledged my Genius program status and gave me an upgrade for it. Rooms are comfortable, quiet, clean and convenient to work and have fun. The view from my bedroom was extra special and the new cafÃ© they just opened in the ground floor offers delicious pastry and beverages.

Negative Reviews: Valet parking was a bit difficult because the space is to tight and it was very busy at check in. The elevator was wait was about 10 minutes, but we were on the 32nd floor. Elevator wait time is related to how many floors there are. With only two elevators, be prepared to wait. We didn't have to go up and down from our room very often, but if we did it would have been a nuisance. I'd still stay again despite the elevator and parking.
Positive Reviews: Location was great. Very quick, easy walk to the Rogers Centre. Room was spacious and clean. Room service was quick and food and delicious.

Negative Reviews: There was no soap for the dishwasher or to wash by hand plates, glasses and cutlery, no hand towel either, no sponge; would have loved to do it myself instead of waiting for the maid. I used a small bar of soap from the bathroom to wash my glasses. Small window in the corner so not enough natural light in the room. Ice machine on only one floor and elevators are SLOW. Bad news! They sent a notice for fire alarm testing during the 3 days I was there, I was there for work and needed to stay in my room for some time during the day. They mentioned they could enter my room to do their test at any time, and I was expecting to hear alarms all day long. I didn't need this. Fortunately, I heard nothing and nobody entered my room.
Positive Reviews: I was in the tower section and it was a small "suite", there was a fridge, microwave and dishwasher which was convenient, but no dining table. The king bed was comfortable. Shower with glass doors. Wifi was fine. The pizza from their restaurant was super greasy and delicious! Fun thing is that you can send them texts if you have questions or requests instead of calling the front desk, used the service and loved it. Very close to Union Station.

Negative Reviews: The valet parking cost $50, I think that should have been included in the room cost.
Positive Reviews: The historic nature of the hotel and the fact that the staff offered to upgrade me to a room with a better view. Also the lobby cafe, bar, and restaurant were convenient and high quality.

Review Title: Quality stay in the heart of Toronto
Negative Reviews: The lifts/elevators take a very long time to get up and down the floors, creating long waits to get around the hotel. There would often be queues on the ground floor and, from the floor of my room, it could often take 5-10 minutes from pressing the button to get a ride down.
Positive Reviews:
The room was lovely and spacious, with an excellent kitchen area and washer/dryer facilities.

The hotel is in a great location, next to the King subway station and a streetcar stop. It connects directly to the underground PATH network so you can walk from key landmarks without going outside, should you need.

There is a cafe connected to the hotel which serves excellent food for breakfast and lunch. The kitchen food at dinner time is very good and I was impressed by the quality of room service when I used it.

I ended up staying in Toronto for an additional week beyond my original booking and was very happy to continue my stay at the hotel.

Negative Reviews: The first night we found broken glass on the carpet next to the bed. After explaining that it needed to be vacuumed up, it took 2 visits from housekeeping to remove it. There are washing/dryer machines in many rooms. Unfortunately we were below one that needed repair, the loud sound emanating from the washer/dryer went on for 4 hours. We requested a room change and within an hour we moved to a quieter room. At times, only 1 of 4 elevators were working. This meant long waits, had to factor elevator wait time into making any plans.
Positive Reviews: A reasonable hotel with a lot of young people staying there, quite a cultural scene. The lobby was always hopping with activity. The Valet Parking staff were amazing. The room was big with a lots of windows. Very central to Attractions and Restaurants.

Negative Reviews:
Bathroom: Can't do much about the layout now that it's set, but the bathroom isn't great. It's quite small with one small sink, which has no where to put any of your toiletries. I had my toiletries on the kitchen counter instead. There is a tub that takes up 1/3 of the room, which is pretty useless (at least for us). A disappointing bathroom overall. 

Parking:  I'm sure everyone sees this one a lot in the cities, as the parking is always so expensive. However, just putting it here for anyone trying to confirm cost. The hotel will charge $50+ a night for valet parking. However, this is also first come, first serve. It was full and not available when we arrived. We used a parking garage around the corner, which was fine with us to try to avoid that high cost of valet parking. However, the cost at the parking garage was just as ridiculous. The first two days, not so bad at $60 something for two night. The 3rd day, however, cost over $70 just by itself. Less than 24 hours and it cost $70+. I know this isn't the hotel's fault, but this is just to give guests that are driving in a full picture of what to plan for if staying at the hotel and will need parking... if you don't want to pay these high costs, look elsewhere or budget it in.
Positive Reviews:
The room was comfortable. The bed was very nice and the kitchen had all the amenities one would need. There was nice desk space and overall, we enjoyed the stay. We also had room service the first night since we got in late, which was surprisingly delicious.

The location was fairly good, as we were able to walk easily everywhere.

Negative Reviews: Would have loved if there was a few quiet spaces to sit and chill with a book other than in your room (like a library). The Lobby is nice, it serves great drinks and has a good buzz, but is more of a 'drinks and transit' area than quiet chill out zone.
Positive Reviews: Extremely comfortable beds. Friendly and efficient staff. Fantastic views from rooftop gym. Having a washer and dryer in the room was a huge bonus!  Despite being Downtown, the room was pretty quiet, which was an unexpected surprise.

Negative Reviews: The shower was a bit outdated and the wifi was not at its best. Also thereâ€™s no possibility to have breakfast in the morning as you have to go to the cafe which is linked to the hotel.
Positive Reviews: Absolutely great stay. Big room with great facilities, friendly staff and superb location. Also the hotel itself is a diamond in the heart of the city.

Negative Reviews: The bathroom was small and the door in the middle which wasnâ€™t easy to access and the layout of the room in the corner was awkward but still well designed to assure a kitchen, lunch and working space. But this is just  to say something bad cause honestly itâ€™s absolutely worth it!
Positive Reviews: We were in the new modern tower, multiple windows with beautiful views of TO! Clean and ultra comfortable bed! Nice staff from arrival to departure. Cool bar to have apÃ©ro! Amazing location near the train station between the new and old TO!

Negative Reviews:
1. The elevators were very slow.
2. The washer/dryer in the room were not working. The maintenance staff tried to repair it, with no success. In the end, they sent our clothes to the main laundry.
3. The jacuzzi was very disappointing - it was like a small, old-fashioned, pool. There was no place to put towels, except on the floor. There was an unpleasant smell from the water.
Positive Reviews:
Location was excellent. The view was amazing. The room was much bigger than we expected, and the fact that it had a kitchenette with microwave was very useful. 
The staff at the front desk were very nice and helpful.

Negative Reviews: Room was not cleaned during our 5 day stay.  Everything we asked for was delivered to our door. They are understaffed, only 2 people working hard with all tables & bar full. Without people traveling the kitchen had one pot, the ring of the laundry front loader was moldy. The staff immediately addressed. Just be prepared & be patient.
Positive Reviews: Great water view 39 floors up. Kitchenette & bright bathroom with good dining table & desk. Staff works hard to make certain you are comfortable & have what you need.

Negative Reviews:
Our room seemed to be close to a service elevator so it was very noisy all night and early in the morning, which made it hard to get a good night's sleep. 

Wish there was more affordable parking options
Positive Reviews: Price and location were great. The staff are friendly and I like that the rooms have a kitchenette. The beds are comfy too!

Negative Reviews: The price. It was a little pricey for one night stay with nothing included. No complimentary water upon arrival or in room. Not enough elevator service - waited forever.
Positive Reviews: Great location. Friendly staff. Excellent late night noise policy. Soft comfortable bed. Clean. Stunning view of the city. Love the Byredo body wash!

Review Title: Great location, hotel itself is good, staff were very helpful.
Negative Reviews: Had to change room twice, first time there was water noise from above that was disturbing, second time the wifi didn't work. Both times staff were very friendly and helpful.
Positive Reviews: Great location, hotel itself is good, staff were very helpful. Room I ended up with was great.

Review Title: Great location let down by dated fixtures and cleanliness issues.
Negative Reviews: Dated bathroom with grimed shower curtain and tub shower that had very slow drainage. Noisy lobby at check-in with some corporate event with a saxophone making it hard to communicate with desk staff. Check-in took a long time. No handsoap at the sink -had to ask for some. Soap holder arms by sink very dirty.
Positive Reviews: Bed very comfortable. Concierge staff very good. Location very convenient.

Negative Reviews: Our room faced Yonge St so it was a bit noisy with traffic. There were three in the room but the dishes only had a set for two. And we had to request extra towels, as there was only two sets. The room could use a bit of updating (e.g. the coffee table was quite scratched up).
Positive Reviews: Location was great. Enjoyed our dinner at the restaurant - the food was delicious. Anytime we needed anything the staff, from the front desk to housekeeping, they were friendly and helpful. Room was big enough for 3 people. Liked that you could crack open the windows for some fresh air. And liked the kitchenette and dishwasher. The bed was comfortable. This was my third time staying here and I would go back again.

Negative Reviews:
loud bar in the area of reception and entrance to rooms 
beds very small 
internet kept cutting out 
very corporate, no personal touch 
not enough towels for number of guests
Positive Reviews:
good location 
clean and tidy 
room service 24 hours

Negative Reviews:
Room was a bit tired but clean.
Flooring had gap.
Extractor in bathroom loose
Drinks were a bit pricey
Lobby could be noisy on a night
Positive Reviews:
Location
Room clean with good hot water or cold.
Staff helpful

Review Title: An enjoyable and relaxing stay in a perfect location
Negative Reviews:
A couple of things. We had to explicitly ask for clean towels every day and for the room to be turned out.
The restaurant is too dark and the music too loud in the evening, so it didnâ€™t feel like a place to have a nice and relaxing dinner, itâ€™s more of a bar. There isnâ€™t really a dedicated breakfast area either where you can sit normally and enjoy a bite before setting out for the day. So we mostly ate outside. I was misled by the image of the beautiful hall that this was the restaurant and you get to experience the decadence of the old building, but thatâ€™s only for hire it seems.
Positive Reviews:
It was the perfect location, with helpful and accommodating staff. We were most grateful to Matthew, who helped bring our bags to the room!
Oh, and the view from the room was amazing!

Negative Reviews: I booked the room that supposed to be with the "view", but actually there was a view only to another building. This was fine, though. Just letting other people know to not expect a view of the city.
Positive Reviews: Great location. Spacious room, with comfortable beds. Friendly staff.

Negative Reviews: The room was not well sound proofed. My husband's pillows were uncomfortable. The toilet paper holder was in a very weird location. The room was very dark even with lights on. TV was disappointing. Elevators were small and slow. There should be dish soap and dish towels for the kitchen.
Positive Reviews: The building itself and the location are perfect. It was very clean and all staff was very friendly. Communicating by text was very convenient. The atmosphere of the lobby and whole hotel was very good. It was nice to have kitchen facilities.

Review Title: Great hotel. Would stay here again.
Negative Reviews: I wish I took the room upgrade at checkin that was offered. I was told that Iâ€™d have an inside room with court yard view. The view was of another building. Not much natural light. Which I didnâ€™t like. Everything else was wonderful.
Positive Reviews: Staff was helpful and professional. Room was clean and comfortable. Liked the cafe and bar on site. Location was great.

Negative Reviews: Room was lacking basic supplies for the kitchenette.  Staff tried to accommodate but still  inadequate when compared to last stay, albeit 12years ago.
Positive Reviews: Location.  Comfort of room.  Good restaurant/bar.  Friendly staff.

Negative Reviews:
House-keeping services were not being offered due to Covid-19 restrictions, which was annoying for long stays (I had extended my stay). 

The pipes are occasionally very loud - unsure if it came from the bathroom or the heating, but it was annoying at times and could wake me up. 

The elevators are very slow, especially with capacity restrictions due
Positive Reviews:
I was upgraded to a Tower Deluxe Suite, after staying in a Historic Studio Suite. Both rooms were very comfortable and spacious. The kitchen and kitchen appliances were also a useful addition for longer stays. 

The view from the Tower Deluxe was spectacular. 

The beds are large and comfortable. 

The staff were all friendly and helpful. A special thanks to Ana Louisa (I hope Iâ€™m getting the name right) who was very helpful. 

The location is perfect in downtown Toronto. Itâ€™s easy to get around Toronto from there, with many great restaurants nearby, and is also a short walk from Union Station. 

The lobby is nice and active at night, with a bar that stays open. The Daily Ritual Cafe also serves great sandwiches and coffee for breakfast.

Review Title: Nice hotel, could do with bedroom renovation
Negative Reviews: The room felt dated, with appliances in need of some replacing or repair. The cleanliness of the kitchen utensils and extractor fan were poor and there were holes in our bed sheets. There was no quilt cover, just two sheets, which seemed a little unusual. Room service didnâ€™t seem to clean the bathroom area (in particular the sink), only cleaning the living and sleeping spaces.
Positive Reviews: The common areas of the hotel are very nice, particularly since itâ€™s an historic building with a great deal of history. The staff are lovely and the hotel is in a good location for easy access to the distillery district. The room was spacious with lovely windows (in the historic part of the hotel) and had a great view down the city streets.

Negative Reviews:
There were practically no kitchen utensils, just a saucepan for cooking, and a couple of spatulas, some eating plates, some spoons and forks, a knife and two cups. The only thing there was four of was glasses. For a stay of several days like ours this is important.
One of the days of our stay they did not make up the room, that is, they â€œstretchedâ€ the sheets but did not vacuum, take out the trash or replace the tea and coffee. We realized this last thing the next morning when we had breakfast. I went to the reception to ask for the coffee bags and they told us that they would bring it to the room but we waited more than half an hour and no one came. When we were leaving the room to go have coffee at the cafeteria, someone from the staff arrived with the bags of coffee, we left anyway.
The weather! Yes, I know, this has nothing to do with the hotel, but it rained every day of our stay :(, next time please talk to the weather guy and ask him for good weather ;D
Positive Reviews:
We stayed at this hotel for 6 nights in the last week of December. The room is spacious, comfortable, as are the beds, everythig as the photos show.
The friendly staff, the old building (which is where our room was, 511 on the 5th floor) charming, the entrance hall, the elevators, the bank vault, the connection to the PATH, all very nice and picturesque.
The location

Negative Reviews:
The carpet underneath the bed hadn't been vacuumed in some time. Also: The carpet was a bit worn, so it's not a sparkly new room, but it's old-school spacious (except for the bathroom, which was smaller).
I couldn't reach room service (tried a few times and no one picked up) so I ended up ordering in instead.
Positive Reviews:
The room was awesome, it was on the 45th (or 46th) floor and the view was pretty spectacular (though north/east, still impressive). The bed was very comfy, the TV had Chromecast, there was an extra sitting area. There was a mini kitchen, too.
The building was also really great, it's an old bank building, so it had a lot of charm/character.
The staff were really great, super attentive and responsive.

Review Title: Great stay.  Restaurant staff are a credit to the hotel. Good rooms and excellent location.
Negative Reviews: Separate cafe for breakfast which was not adequate for a hotel of this size. Had to walk back through to the hotel with takeout purchases to sit in the lobby. When we went for a hot option which were limited they had stopped serving half an hour before the advertised time. We gave up and went to the Sunset Grill nearby the next three mornings. The night we arrived after a very long journey the lobby area was dark with loud music playing. Quite disconcerting. I couldnâ€™t see what I was signing! We were in the hotel for a number of evenings after this and it didnâ€™t happen again.
Positive Reviews: We booked this hotel quite last minute as I didnâ€™t like the reviews of our first choice hotel. So glad we changed. Location was excellent with a quick walk from the station where we arrive on the airport train. The restaurant is very nice and reasonably priced with a varied selection. The staff in the restaurant were first class, so friendly and accommodating. Service was brilliant. Management were definitely present which is always good to see. The room in the tower had a brilliant view, it was spacious, clean and the aircon was great.

Review Title: Would recommend this hotel for a convenient stay for first timers in Toronto
Negative Reviews: The room did show some signs of wear and tear that should be fixed and updated. The tv werenâ€™t able to pair with phone to chrome cast even though it said it would be able to. Reception area a little loud upon arrival because located right next to bar so a little difficult to hear everything said upon checking in but very good and patient staff
Positive Reviews: Spacious room, with everything you need including a small kitchenette, very comfortable bed and nice use of the space in the room. It also had a good hairdryer in bathroom and plenty of clean towels, also good storage for coats and suitcases. Great value, when it comes to location and quality of rooms. Close to public transport and within walking distance to most attractions in downtown Toronto. Staff also very helpful and professional

Negative Reviews:
Phone in room had no instructions on 
Bathroom is quite small although sufficient
Better signage of where reception is from king St West would be helpful. It's on a side street.
If you enter the door on king st with suitcases and bags, you need to go down stairs and accros the bar area to reception .
Positive Reviews:
Great location in the city
Rooms are spacey enough for spending small amounts of time there.
Friendly reception team

Negative Reviews:
My only complaint if any, would probably be for the
House Keeping. The staff needs to pay a little extra
attention to cleaning. Which was not major though
Positive Reviews:
Everything. I canâ€™t write enough. The Location is the best.
Close to everything you need and all the landmarks are a
walk away. The rooms are amazing. Well spaced and with
all amenities. Bed was super comfy. There is a fantastic
coffee shop at the hotel. It is attached to the main line
subway. All the staff were super courteous.

I am definitely staying here when I return to Toronto

Review Title: Nice stay for a great city trip
Negative Reviews: The suite for 2 only had one fauteuil and a (comfy) desk chair. Would have preferred an extra  fauteuil. Room prices in Toronto (not only this hotel) too high.
Positive Reviews: Centrally located, spacious suite, quite good gym, quality of in-room dining food, high quality and fresh stuff art the Daily Rituals cafe. We liked Toronto very much. Clean, sympathetic, nice neighbourhoods, lot to do. Efficient check out. Thanks for a great service.

Review Title: Loved our stay here  Great location
Negative Reviews:
i found the bed itself a bit uncomfortable, although the bedding, sheets etc, were nice.  Having to noisily slam the door to close it  is annoying, when one is going to get coffee and allowing the other to sleep in ðŸ˜€
Air conditioning was a bit loud coming on and woke me a couple times thru the night.
Positive Reviews: We liked so many things about this hotel, but we chose it specifically for location. We had  a nice clean room,   pleasant staff in all encounters, a lovely restaurant and fast elevators considering our high floor!!  Easy entry to a nice, large room. All the extra amenities such as dishwasher, wine bottle openers etc were so pleasant although we didn't use them.

Negative Reviews: there was a bit of mold in the shower on the caulking
Positive Reviews: good location, superb valet parking the car was there everyone! excellent room service

Review Title: Our stay was pleasant and comfortable.
Negative Reviews: Some of the tiles in the bathroom were cracked. Needed to be upgraded.
Positive Reviews: Great location, comfortable beds and pillows, friendly staff, clean accommodations, beautiful lobby, good room service

Negative Reviews:
The bathroom was very small and outdated.  It just seemed like an afterthought in design.  The lighting was also poor. 
My biggest con was having to pay the entire 4-night stay upfront AND putting down an additional $250 deposit. I felt like I was renting an apartment.
Positive Reviews: The bar and cafÃ© downstairs were great and location to the train and Union Station were great.  Room service was excellent and you can't beat the view at 30+ stories up!  Room was spotless and cleaned exceptionally well every day.

Negative Reviews: It's a very minor quibble, but it would be better if the room layout didn't put the bathroom door right next to the bed!
Positive Reviews: Very nice room with a good view and a decent kitchenette. Big, comfortable bed. Exemplary staff. Great food in the restaurant. Well-presented, stylish lobby. Cool building (check out the old bank vault in the absement!). Fantastic location (very central and right next to a metro station).

Negative Reviews: The carpet in our room had some dirty spots. Coffee table chipped in several places. But overall very nice.
Positive Reviews: Nice beds. Wonderful view. Very spacious. Good restaurant. Good location. Nice staff.

Negative Reviews: AC didnâ€™t work properly. when we arrive to our hotel room, it was very warm! at night, it wasnâ€™t as cold as it is supposed to be.
Positive Reviews: the front desk were very helpful! they let me do an early check-in at 10:30am even if the original check in is at 3pm. one staff in particular, Gie, personally helped and accommodated us for the valet parking since there were parking restrictions that time due film shooting! the rooms were clean and very nice location which is walking distance to restaurants, mall and tourist spot! i also like the feature of communicating to front desk through a text message which is very efficient! overall, will stay there again!

Negative Reviews: The moment when I needed to leave my room and head to the airport :(
Positive Reviews: Where shall I start... If I could, I would give rate it as 15, 20. It's 10+ for me. I had a wonderful stay at One King West Hotel. I had wonderful views, I woke up to the view of CN Tower, had breakfast looking at the CN Tower and also the Ontario Lake. Room was very spacious, staff was friendly, location of the hotel is perfect!! I can't describe exactly how I felt during my 5 days at this hotel with words. I truly had a great time! Thank you! If I come back to Toronto and I think I will, I would like to stay in the same room, please :) I felt home at this hotel!

Negative Reviews:
Small bathroom

Positive Reviews:

Review Title: I love this hotel and will definitely book here again
